short_summary: The Department of National Defense is purchasing 60 Apple 16-inch MacBooks.  In order to be accepted, a bid must be received to the bid due date and time. (details available at the contracted email)  Buyer name: Alyssa Brook Buyer email: alyssa.brook@ssc-spc.gc.ca
description: The Department of National Defense is purchasing 60 Apple 16-inch MacBooks, along with client options for 5 units of the 16-inch MacBook Pro for quality assurance testing, and another 5 units of the 16-inch MacBook Reserve for scientific computing and 40 units M1 versions that are also for science and science for training.
